plugin.name: VBscript_Version
plugin.author: Nick Gammon
plugin.purpose: Shows version of VBscript you are using
plugin.description:
Shows which version of VBscript you have installed.
Usage -----
scriptversion <-- shows version number
VBscript_Version:help <-- this help screen

muclient.script:
sub OnShowVersion (a, b, c) world.note "Script engine = " & ScriptEngine world.note "Version = " & ScriptEngineMajorVersion & _ "." & ScriptEngineMinorVersion world.note "Build = " & ScriptEngineBuildVersion end sub
Sub OnPluginInstall OnShowVersion 0, 0, 0 End Sub
Sub OnHelp (sName, sLine, wildcards) World.Note World.GetPluginInfo (World.GetPluginID, 3) End Sub
